summary: Oh shit you know how dan was taking about how messy phil is and cluttery and all that. Well. Guess who’s room is messy (the moon...
question: Oh shit you know how dan was taking about how messy phil is and cluttery and all that. Well. Guess who’s room is messy (the moon room). And guess who’s room is pristine. (Phil’s set room). Like in pinof 9 the only things under the bed where a brand new set of cards and a brand new shovel. Just thought it was interesting considering who’s supposed to be the messy one here . Hmmm

tags: honestly idk where i was goin with this but i hope it made sense lmao
summary: I think about Dan’s twitter description a lot: ‘my life is a joke.’ And I don’t mean this in a negative way at all but sometimes...
question: I think about Dan’s twitter description a lot: ‘my life is a joke.’ And I don’t mean this in a negative way at all but sometimes I think “he was a teenage fanboy that met his fav YouTuber and now lives happily with him a decade later like...? fairytales are quaking (I’m sorry I needed to rant about this)
answer:
his life like,,,,,literally is a fanfic. i know we joke abt it a lot but dnp are living a story that, objectively, sounds fake. it sounds like a joke. like try explaining this to someone who doesn’t know, it sounds like a bloody disney channel movie? 

guy gets noticed by his idol even though there’s no obvious thing that sets him apart from the crowd, they spend hours upon hours on skype until they can finally meet in person, and they film an iconic vid together. then guy goes back home and wants to try to get famous himself. and he fuckin does. oh, and the famous guy he met? yeah they’re still best friends throughout this whole thing. i mean the guy goes to uni to get closer to him and moves in when he’s asked and then they move again - together - bc the famous guy wanted his best friend to do a radio show with him and then they make a whole other channel dedicated to just them playing games bc they both love it and they love doing it together and then they do uhm a fucking tour and write a book together and then they move again, still together ofc, and then and then and then they do the whole damn thing again they do another world tour with eighty two shows all while still building this incredible universe together and like. 

goddamn

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: I think Dan dating Sarah (which is the other rumor) is more likely than Phil dating Lauren. Like you said Lauren lives in...
question: I think Dan dating Sarah (which is the other rumor) is more likely than Phil dating Lauren. Like you said Lauren lives in America and while it’s not impossible, that’s a lot of distance for a relationship
answer: I mean, I don’t think it’s likely that any of them are dating each other. Lauren and Sarah are Dan and Phil’s employees. And yes, they may be friends besides that, but dating your boss is going to create a weird, unhealthy power imbalance. Not to mention it’s just unprofessional.

reblog.comment: I mean, I don’t think it’s likely that any of them are dating each other. Lauren and Sarah are Dan and Phil’s employees. And yes, they may be friends besides that, but dating your boss is going to create a weird, unhealthy power imbalance. Not to mention it’s just unprofessional.

summary: But why is that phannies can create blogs dedicated to Dan's personal life and publicly post their speculations, but Dan should...
question: But why is that phannies can create blogs dedicated to Dan's personal life and publicly post their speculations, but Dan should have never tried to defend himself and tell how he felt? Phannies can be as rude and invasive as they please but Dan should never open his mouth and just be quiet while they spread garbage theories about him and his best friend. If I were Dan I wouldn't have been as nice, all he did was call people turnips and ask people to stop believing in and spreading "proof" lol
answer:
I just think it was a bad setup. I’m not saying Dan had no right to defend himself, or that he shouldn’t have tried to explain anything. But not through a text-based anonymous medium on the internet. It’s easier for everyone to be rude or ballsy on the internet, behind a screen. And it’s difficult to read someone’s tone over text. Things can be misunderstood or misinterpreted much more easily. Plus, constantly being criticized and surrounded by drama isn’t good for anyone’s mental health. Especially back then, when we all know that Dan’s mental health was the shits to begin with.


That’s all in the past, there’s nothing we can do to change it, so ultimately nobodies opinion matters, but I personally think there was probably a much better, much more professional way to do what Dan was trying to do.

summary:
i hit 1,7k and hey MEET UP! it’s been a while and i’ve never hosted one soooo
autumn is the best season, october is the best...
body:
i hit 1,7k and hey MEET UP! it’s been a while and i’ve never hosted one soooo

autumn is the best season, october is the best month. that’s the tea. so, i thought we could do a meet up where we talk about what we love about autumn, if we have special plans, if we’ve taken any amazing pictures, art we love/have made, poetry, music, ANYTHING that’s keeping us busy and happy either by making it ourselves or enjoying something someone else has made. so share some happy, cozy, leafy, autumn vibes, shoutout your favourite artists, post a selfie where you look hella cute in a sweater, tell us why you’re excited for halloween! anything!

primary dates will be 18-24th october, but just whenever yknow🌻🍂🍁🍄

tag your posts with #phandom meetup and #octoberphans ✨🌻

(reblog this if you feel like it so it doesn’t flop and/or get lost on this hellsite)

reblog.comment:
i hit 1,7k and hey MEET UP! it’s been a while and i’ve never hosted one soooo

autumn is the best season, october is the best month. that’s the tea. so, i thought we could do a meet up where we talk about what we love about autumn, if we have special plans, if we’ve taken any amazing pictures, art we love/have made, poetry, music, ANYTHING that’s keeping us busy and happy either by making it ourselves or enjoying something someone else has made. so share some happy, cozy, leafy, autumn vibes, shoutout your favourite artists, post a selfie where you look hella cute in a sweater, tell us why you’re excited for halloween! anything!

primary dates will be 18-24th october, but just whenever yknow🌻🍂🍁🍄

tag your posts with #phandom meetup and #octoberphans ✨🌻
